title: Nicholas Eberstadt: "Men Without Work: Post-Pandemic Edition"
description: Michael talks to Nicholas Eberstadt, who first wrote "Men Without Work" in 2016. He talks about the updated edition, "Men Without Work: Post-Pandemic Edition." Original air date 20 September 2022. The book was published on 19 September 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Nicholas Eberstadt, Michael Smerconish)
